Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0699 affecting package shapelib for versions less than 1.5.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-0699 affecting package shapelib for versions less than 1.5.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package shapelib is earlier than 1.5.0-3, affected by CVE-2022-0699
